titleStmt.title: Loves victory obtained, or, A pleasant sportful joyful meeting, between a young man and his sweeting at first they met, and then they kist, and afterwards did what they list : 'twas all within a garden green, where pretty sport was to be seen, then listen to my song a while, I'm sure here's that will make you smile.

Loves victory obtained, or, A pleasant sportful joyful meeting, between a young man and his sweeting at first they met, and then they kist, and afterwards did what they list : 'twas all within a garden green, where pretty sport was to be seen, then listen to my song a while, I'm sure here's that will make you smile.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
"To the tune of: True blew, or, ha ha ha"--P. [1].
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
